actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and Foreign Marketing and Product Promotion

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a pilot program to permit two States to enter into a reciprocal agreement for the interstate shipment and marketing of State inspected meat and poultry products and to establish a task force to advise the Secretary with respect to such pilot program, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to: (1) conduct a two-year pilot program to permit two contiguous States to enter into a reciprocal agreement to permit interstate shipping and marketing of inspected meat and poultry products; and (2) establish a related task force to advise the Secretary regarding such program and the establishment of other such reciprocal agreements.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture to conduct a pilot program to permit two States to enter into a reciprocal agreement for the interstate shipment and marketing of State inspected meat and poultry products and to establish a task force to advise the Secretary with respect to such pilot program, and for other purposes.
